login.title: System Login
login.logo: Cybersoc Big Data Security Management Platform

synthesis: To focus on the panoramic situation，the security situation of the whole network is in full view
asset: To understand the assets and focus on the assets，Will fully understand the fingerprint information and risk status of the assets.
vulnerability: it makes vulnerabilities and weaknesses clear at a glance
threat: it makes network threats nowhere hide
disposition: network security threats life cycle of supervision
warning: To pay attention to the whole network early warning release，let the network security supervision "zero distance"
Website: Fully monitoring the security posture of the website，
HongKong: Regional situation display in Kong Hong
